Line1.71176: The Abbot...opened the door! And the pale devil smiled. He took the forbidden knowledge!
Line3.BAE4: Shh, it's all right. I've cleared the way out. Can you walk?
Line9.71176: There is no way out! What knowledge remains must never leave...
VoiceDir11.71176: Crazed. Shouting a sacred oath to the rafters.
VoiceDir3.BAE4: Urgent. Hushed. Trying to calm the monk before he alerts more ghosts.
